channel.title: Why Whonix uses old kernel?
channel.description: Hello! I am new in Whonix & linux in general. Could someone explain me why Whonix-Workstation uses old 3.* kernel? Why not to upgrade to the current 4.* kernel?

item.title: Why Whonix uses old kernel?
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Hi. Whonix 13 is based on Debian Jessie aka old-stable that uses an older/stable kernel. Its not a problem as Whonix runs in a VM and so hardware compatibility is not a factor.

Read full topic

item.title: Why Whonix uses old kernel?
item.dc:creator: uselessUser
item.description:
Hello!
I am new in Whonix & linux in general. Could someone explain me why Whonix-Workstation uses old 3.* kernel?
Why not to upgrade to the current 4.* kernel?

Read full topic
